column4: News;Phnom Penh: On the morning of December 2
column7: Deputy Chief of Police and the Police Commissioner of Phnom Penh
column8: accompanied by Deputy Inspector of Inspection of Chamkar Mon and the Chief of Police
column10: visited a police officer in Chamkar Morn district
column11: who was wounded in the call of duty by a ------Chinese criminal on December 1
column12: 2018.------The officer down is currently being treated in the Russian hospital.------The Commissioner provided 2 million Riels and the Inspector provided 1 million Riels to Mao Samnang for treatment in recognition of his bravery in the line of fire.------TD News------
